backend/main.mo: Actor implementing authorization, blob storage, and CRUD operations for users, patients, sessions, and captures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing various frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app shell, providers, and all main routes for navigation.
frontend/src/captures/batchCapture.ts: Controller that coordinates multi-photo batch captures with progress, completion, and error callbacks.
frontend/src/captures/captureWorkflow.ts: Workflow for triggering captures, generating thumbnails, producing metadata, and saving blobs.
frontend/src/captures/thumbnail.ts: Functions for generating image thumbnails and converting base64 data into binary formats.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, footer, and connection badge, rendering routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/BatchCaptureButt: Runs a 5-shot batch capture with progress indicator and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/CaptureGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of capture thumbnails with timestamps and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Shows connection status with icons, badges, and optional reconnect or error alerts.
frontend/src/components/DistanceGuide.ts: Simple alert showing recommended 2–4 cm imaging distance.
frontend/src/components/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides ZIP and PDF export actions for a selected patient session with loading states and toasts.
frontend/src/components/LastCapturesTray: Shows up to five recent captures with eye badges and navigation to gallery.
UI for zoom, LED mode, eye toggle, and capture actions with states for timers and capture.
frontend/src/components/LiveStreamViewer: Renders base64 video frames to a canvas with zoom support and live/paused badges.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and status display.
frontend/src/components/PatientForm.tsx: Provides UI for selecting existing patients or creating new ones, including form fields and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/PermissionGuidan: Displays an error alert with retry and demo-mode options when device connection fails.
frontend/src/components/RequirementsHelp: Shows browser, hardware, and permission requirements for using the app, plus demo mode info.
frontend/src/components/SessionForm.tsx: Manages selecting or creating sessions for a given patient, including session type and eye selection.
Lets users choose WebSerial, WebUSB, or demo transport modes based on browser support.
frontend/src/export/manifest.ts: Generates an export manifest containing patient, session, and capture metadata including quality and annotation flags.
frontend/src/export/pdfReport.ts: Builds an HTML-based printable report summarizing patient, session, and capture details with embedded images.
frontend/src/export/zipExport.ts: Creates a simple export by downloading a manifest JSON and each capture image individually.
frontend/src/gallery/annotationModel.ts: Defines data structures for annotations, strokes, labels, and calibration for image captures.
frontend/src/gallery/localPersistence.ts: Handles localStorage persistence for quality scores, annotations, and calibration data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating users, patients, sessions, and captures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind styles and a medical-themed light/dark color palette with custom component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/mcu/autoReconnect.ts: Implements automatic reconnection logic with retries, delays, and status callbacks for a MicrocontrollerClient.
frontend/src/mcu/MicrocontrollerClient.t: Client wrapper managing microcontroller transport selection, connection state, telemetry, streaming, and command sending.
frontend/src/mcu/protocol.ts: Defines microcontroller message types, commands, telemetry structures, and JSON encode/decode helpers.
frontend/src/mcu/simulator/demoSimulator: Simulates a microcontroller by emitting handshake, telemetry, video frames, and photos for demo/testing.
frontend/src/mcu/transports/webSerialTra: Implements a Web Serial transport that connects to a serial device, handles streaming text I/O, decodes messages, and manages connection state.
frontend/src/mcu/transports/webUsbTransp: Implements a WebUSB transport that opens a USB device, continuously reads messages, sends commands, and tracks connection state.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectionPage.tsx: UI page for choosing a connection method, initiating device connection, handling errors, and navigating to the live camera.
frontend/src/pages/ExportReportsPage.tsx: Provides patient and session selectors and displays an export panel for generating reports from stored captures.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays captures filtered by patient and session, with dialogs for viewing and scoring individual images.
frontend/src/pages/LiveCameraPage.tsx: Live camera interface supporting streaming, capture workflows, batch capture, and interaction with microcontroller telemetry.
Allows creating/selecting patients and sessions, updates active session state, and links to the live camera interface.
frontend/src/state/activeSessionStore.ts: Provides a React context for managing patient/session IDs, session number, and current eye selection.
frontend/src/state/mcuStore.tsx: Defines a React context wrapping MicrocontrollerClient, exposing connection state, telemetry, frames, and auto‑reconnect handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, with hash‑routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project goals, architecture, and existing features for the EarScope Pro cross‑platform medical imaging app.
